item.title: Animating Mass Shootings in the US from 1982 to 2019
item.description: Introduction The news organization Mother Jones has an open-source database of US mass shootings from 1982 to 2019 available online. The data was gathered as part of an in-depth investigation on mass shootings after the movie-theater shooting in Aurora, Colorado in July, 2012, where 12 people were killed, and over 70 people injured. Iâ€™ve been wanting to learn how to animate data visualizations with the gganimate package. I thought that it would be a good idea to animate the mass shooting data.
